articles.author: Oren Liebermann, Haley Britzky
articles.title: US moves forces closer to Israel and Lebanon amid concerns of escalating cross-border fire - CNN
articles.description: The US is moving forces closer to Israel and Lebanon amid concerns of escalating cross-border fire, according to two US officials, including forces able to carry out an evacuation of American citizens.
